metadata.description: When a 12-year-old boy is kidnapped by a rogue automaton, London's finest brass-bound arm of the law, RoboCopper, and his partner must bring the robot to justice and save the child.  But as the case progresses, they uncover lies and corruption within one of London's most powerful organizations!  This gritty, action-packed one-shot combines police drama and sci-fi thrills in a retro-futuristic dystopia with steampunk style!
metadata.name: RoboCopper
